info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 5 at 2:47PM PDT until May 5 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...Southern San Bernardino County including the Morongo Basin and Yucca Valley.
* WHEN...Until 500 PM PDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 247 PM PDT, Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms persist across the region. Minor flooding remains possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Twentynine Palms, Yucca Valley, Twentynine Palms Base, Amboy, Twentynine Palms Airport, Joshua Tree Lake Campground, Ludlow, Joshua Tree and Morongo Valley. - This includes the following highways... State Route 247 in San Bernardino County between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 40 in California between mile markers 46 and 75. State Route 62 in San Bernardino County between mile markers 1 and 61...and between mile markers 64 and 67...and between mile markers 95 and 104. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON
